name: Portobello Parmesan
ingredients: 1 ounce freshly grated parmesan cheese (1/4 cup)

instructions.en: Gently scrape the gills off the underside of the mushroom caps with a spoon
instructions.sk: Jemne vyškrabte lupienky zo spodnej strany hríbových klobúčikov lyžicou
instructions.ja: スプーンでマッシュルームの裏側のヒダを優しく取り除く

instructions.en: Cut off the stems to make them level with the underside of the mushrooms
instructions.sk: Odrežte stonky, aby boli zarovnané so spodnou stranou húb
instructions.ja: マッシュルームの裏側と同じ高さになるように軸を切り落とす

instructions.en: Clean the mushrooms with a damp cloth
instructions.ja: 湿らせた布でマッシュルームを拭いて洗う
オーブンを400°F（200°C）に予熱する

instructions.en: Place mushroom caps stem side up on a foil-lined baking sheet
instructions.sk: Položte hríbové klobúčiky stonkou nahor na plech vyložený alobalom
instructions.ja: アルミホイルを敷いたベーキングシートに軸側を上にしてマッシュルームを置く

instructions.en: Turn caps stem side down and bake for another 5 minutes
instructions.sk: Otočte klobúčiky stonkou nadol a pečte ďalších 5 minút
instructions.ja: マッシュルームを裏返して軸側を下にし、さらに5分間焼く

instructions.en: Remove from oven and turn caps stem side up again
instructions.sk: Vyberte z rúry a otočte klobúčiky opäť stonkou nahor
instructions.ja: オーブンから取り出し、再び軸側を上にする

instructions.en: Sprinkle with salt, pepper, and garlic powder
instructions.sk: Posypte soľou, korením a cesnakovým práškom
instructions.ja: 塩、コショウ、ニンニクパウダーを振りかける

instructions.en: Spread 1 tablespoon of spaghetti sauce on each mushroom
instructions.sk: Natrite 1 polievkovú lyžicu špagietovej omáčky na každú hubu
instructions.ja: 各マッシュルームに大さじ1のスパゲッティソースを広げる

instructions.en: Divide mozzarella and parmesan cheeses between the mushrooms
instructions.sk: Rozdeľte mozzarellu a parmezán medzi huby
instructions.ja: モッツァレラチーズとパルメザンチーズをマッシュルームに分けて乗せる

instructions.en: Bake for 5-7 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly
instructions.sk: Pečte 5-7 minút, kým sa syr neroztopí a nezačne bublať
instructions.ja: チーズが溶けて泡立つまで5〜7分間焼く

instructions.en: Optionally garnish with chopped parsley before serving
instructions.sk: Voliteľne ozdobte nasekanou petržlenovou vňaťou pred podávaním
instructions.ja: 必要に応じて刻んだパセリを振りかけて提供する
